oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Price Memorial AME Zion: sign and bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Price Memorial African Methodist Episcopal Zion

Color photograph of church sign and bell. The church sign is mounted within a brick enclosure. Lettering of the sign reads, "Price Memorial AME Zion Church; Sunday School, 9:30AM; Church Service, 11:00 AM; Wednesday, 7:00 PM; Pastor: J.T. Holmes." A bell, hanging from a wooden crosstie, is mounted between two brick columns, both resembling a chimney stack.

Price Memorial AME Zion's current church building dates to 1981. It sits in close proximity to several African American churches. At the time of fieldwork (June 22, 1998), J.T. Holmes served as pastor.
